Show Debug Message: With this action you can send a debug message to the Compiler Output. This message can be either a string or a real number, but if you wish to use both then the number must be converted to a string (see the action Number To String). Note that you can output multiple messages using this action by clicking the icon to expand the action with further output fields.
The message to show in the Output window
The above action block code will check a variable and if it returns <tt>true</tt> then a couple of debug messages will be shown in the Output window.
